001package org.biopax.paxtools.impl.level3;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.model.BioPAXElement;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.Entity;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.*;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.util.BPCollections;
007import org.biopax.paxtools.util.ClassFilterSet;
008
009import java.util.Set;
010
011import static org.biopax.paxtools.util.SetEquivalenceChecker.hasEquivalentIntersection;
012
013
014public abstract class EntityImpl extends NamedImpl implements Entity
015{
016// ------------------------------ FIELDS ------------------------------
017
018        private Set<Interaction> participantOf;
019        /**
020         * This Set keeps statements describing the availability of this data (e.g. a copyright
021         * statement).
022         */
023        private Set<String> availability;
024
025        /**
026         * This Set keeps statements describing the data sources for this data.
027         */
028        private Set<Provenance> dataSource;
029
030
031        /**
032         * This Set keeps evidence related to this entity
033         */
034        private Set<Evidence> evidence;
035
036        /**
037         * Helper object for managing names
038         */
039
040// --------------------------- CONSTRUCTORS ---------------------------
041
042        public EntityImpl()
043        {
044                this.availability = BPCollections.I.createSet();
045                this.dataSource = BPCollections.I.createSafeSet();
046                this.participantOf = BPCollections.I.createSafeSet();
047                this.evidence = BPCollections.I.createSafeSet();
048        }
049
050// ------------------------ INTERFACE METHODS ------------------------
051
052
053// --------------------- ACCESORS and MUTATORS---------------------
054
055        public Set<String> getAvailability()
056        {
057                return availability;
058        }
059
060        public void addAvailability(String availability_text)
061        {
062                if(availability_text != null && availability_text.length() > 0)
063                        availability.add(availability_text);
064        }
065
066        public void removeAvailability(String availability_text)
067        {
068                if(availability_text != null)
069                        this.availability.remove(availability_text);
070        }
071
072        public Set<Provenance> getDataSource()
073        {
074                return dataSource;
075        }
076
077        public void setDataSource(Set<Provenance> dataSource)
078        {
079                this.dataSource = dataSource;
080        }
081
082        public void addDataSource(Provenance dataSource)
083        {
084                if(dataSource != null)
085                        this.dataSource.add(dataSource);
086        }
087
088        public void removeDataSource(Provenance dataSource)
089        {
090                if(dataSource != null)
091                        this.dataSource.remove(dataSource);
092        }
093
094// --------------------- Interface entity ---------------------
095
096        public Set<Interaction> getParticipantOf()
097        {
098                return participantOf;
099        }
100
101
102        //
103        // observable interface implementation
104        //
105        /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
106        public Set<Evidence> getEvidence()
107        {
108                return evidence;
109        }
110
111        public void addEvidence(Evidence newEvidence)
112        {
113                if(newEvidence != null)
114                        this.evidence.add(newEvidence);
115        }
116
117        public void removeEvidence(Evidence oldEvidence)
118        {
119                if(oldEvidence != null)
120                        this.evidence.remove(oldEvidence);
121        }
122
123        @Override
124        protected boolean semanticallyEquivalent(BioPAXElement element)
125        {
126                boolean equivalence = false;
127                if (element instanceof Entity)
128                {
129                        Entity otherEntity = (Entity) element;
130                        equivalence =
131                                hasEquivalentIntersection(dataSource, otherEntity.getDataSource())
132                            && hasEquivalentIntersection(
133                                        new ClassFilterSet<Xref, UnificationXref>(getXref(), UnificationXref.class),
134                                        new ClassFilterSet<Xref, UnificationXref>(otherEntity.getXref(), UnificationXref.class))
135                            && hasEquivalentIntersection(evidence, otherEntity.getEvidence());
136                }
137                return equivalence;
138        }
139
140}
